client-settings.name: 株式会社アザナ（マリンサポートタイド・残波）

extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:100%!important;height:44px;position:fixed;top:0}#site-translate-header-wrapper p{font-size:10px;line-height:12px}#site-translate-message{display:table-cell;height:44px;vertical-align:middle;width:5000px} *{ word-break: normal; /* overflow-wrap : break-word; */ } .container{margin:44px 0 0}.gNav {top:44px} .gNav.fixed{top:44px}.header__logoArea__tel{width:auto}.navList__cont:nth-of-type(4) { width: auto; } .pointArea ul li a span.point_position{font-size:13px}.pointArea ul li span > span{font-size:13px}.itemList_block h5{width:auto} .time_price { font-size: 280% !important; } .timeprice2, .timeprice3 { font-size: 30% !important; } .time_priceresult { font-size: 460% !important; } .time_priceresult1 { font-size: 24px !important; } .time_priceresult2 { font-size: 22px !important;bottom: 67px !important; } .time_priceresult2:lang(zh) { top: 0 !important; right: -30px !important; } .bnrStyle01__contact__txt.flexBlock { padding: 15px 20px 15px 85px !important; } .headTitle-price.renew dd.price { font-size: 70px !important;} .headTitle-price__price01 { font-size: 30% !important; bottom: -30% !important; } .headTitle-price__price02 { top: 0 !important; font-size: 16px !important; right: 0 !important; } .headTitle-price.renew dd.details ul { height: auto !important; } .headTitle-price.renew dd.details li { margin: 2% !important; height: auto !important;font-size: 21% !important; } .night dl.no1,.night dl.no1{-webkit-transform:translateY(180px)!important;-moz-transform:translateY(180px)!important;-ms-transform:translateY(180px)!important;-o-transform:translateY(180px)!important;transform:translateY(180px)!important}.kayak dl.no1,.kayak dl.no1{-webkit-transform:translateY(180px)!important;-moz-transform:translateY(180px)!important;-ms-transform:translateY(180px)!important;-o-transform:translateY(180px)!important;transform:translateY(180px)!important}.diving dl.no1,.diving dl.no1{-webkit-transform:translateY(0)!important;-moz-transform:translateY(0)!important;-ms-transform:translateY(0)!important;-o-transform:translateY(0)!important;transform:translateY(0)!important}.web dl.no1,.web dl.no1{-webkit-transform:translateY(0)!important;-moz-transform:translateY(0)!important;-ms-transform:translateY(0)!important;-o-transform:translateY(0)!important;transform:translateY(0)!important}.snorkel dl.no1,.snorkel dl.no1{-webkit-transform:translateY(30px)!important;-moz-transform:translateY(30px)!important;-ms-transform:translateY(30px)!important;-o-transform:translateY(120px)!important;transform:translateY(30px)!important} dl.no1 li { line-height: 1.2 !important;} ul.tour_tide_icon li { font-size: 80% !important; } dl.check_flow01 dd:nth-of-type(1):lang(en) { top:0 !important; } dl.check_flow01 dd:nth-of-type(2):lang(en) { top:30px !important; } dl.check_flow01 dd:nth-of-type(3):lang(en) { top:90px !important; } dl.check_flow01 dd:nth-of-type(4):lang(en) { top:150px !important; }dl.check_flow01:lang(en) { padding-bottom: 40px !important; } .check_flow02 dl:lang(en) { width: 18.8%; } .check_flow02 dl:lang(zh) { width: 19.6%; } .check_flow02 dd:nth-of-type(2):lang(en) { min-height: 140px !important; } .check_flow02 dd:nth-of-type(2):lang(zh) { min-height: 90px !important; } .price__before, .price__after { font-size: 55px !important; } .orange{margin: 0 0 0 0.3%;} .top_ttl_txt{font-size:100%;} .titStyle01__list{margin: 2% auto;} .headTitle-price.renew h1 .fontweght {font-size: 68% !important;} .time_type {font-size: 100% !important; width: 32% !important;} .free_rental {font-size: 100% !important;} .tour_plan_title_icon2.rentBg {font-size: 124% !important;} .txt_l .bnrStyle01__contact__link {font-size: 100%;} /* recruit */ .header {margin: 44px auto 0;} @media screen and (min-width: 971px) {.btnarea .txtBtnStyle a:before {left: -150px;} .catch__voice__in {width: auto;}.catch__voice__in ul li a {width: auto;}.fontStyle span {font-size: 120%;}.support_link dl { float: none; display: inline-block;width: 32.8%;vertical-align: top; }.main {margin-top: 155px;}.staffInfo__tit {font-size: 140% } ul.head_bnr_tel li:first-child{ width: 69%; padding-right: 0;}} @media screen and (max-width: 970px) { .btnarea .txtBtnStyle a:before{top: -30px;} .btnarea .txtBtnStyle a {font-size: 90%; max-width: none;} .fixed { top: 44px; }} @media screen and (max-width: 768px){ .headTitle-price.renew dd.price { max-width: none !important; } .header__logoAreaWrapper{top:44px}.spMenuArea{top:112px} .time_price {font-size: 250% !important;} .time_priceresult {font-size: 400% !important;}.time_priceresult2 {bottom: 0 !important;} .time_type {width: 100% !important;}}
